name: @cloudflare/quick-edit
description: VSCode for Web hosted for use in Cloudflare's Quick Editor
author: workers-devprod@cloudflare.com

scripts.dev: concurrently './vscode/scripts/code-web.sh --extensionDevelopmentPath ../web/cloudflare-logic' 'npm --prefix web/cloudflare-logic run watch-web' 'yarn --cwd vscode watch' 'yarn --cwd vscode watch-web'
scripts.setup: rm -rf vscode web/assets web/cloudflare-logic web/vscode && ./setup.sh && npm --prefix web/cloudflare-logic install && yarn --cwd vscode
